short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the 18+ popup block on Reddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the annoying "You must be 18+ to view this" popup when browsing reddit via desktop. The full source code can be found on github (https://github.com/mbc012/reddit-anti-block).
